product_name: Sea to Summit CoolMax Adaptor Liner - Mummy
long_description: This Sea to Summit CoolMax Adapter mummy bag liner is specifically designed for use in warm or humid conditions. Its moisture management fabric adapts to a variety of temperatures and humidity.
short_description: This Sea to Summit CoolMax Adapter mummy bag liner is specifically designed for use in warm or humid conditions. Its moisture management fabric adapts to a variety of temperatures and humidity.
